messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Bolo - stolen sword
messages.msgSnippet: FWIW Lou This was sent via Canadian Post, registered and insured - the owner and the buyer are in communication and from what can be seen this was a clear
messages.messageBody:
FWIW Lou
This was sent via Canadian Post, registered and insured - the owner and the buyer are in communication and from what can be seen this was a clear theft and not an "empty box" scam. If I hear any more I will post it. 
Tom Helm
www.toryu-mon.com


On Oct 9, 2015, at 3:32 AM, "Lou La Torre loulatorre@... [nihontostudy]" <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

 

Which delivery service did he use? 

I'm asking only because I will make sure not to use them myself. 

Thanks,

Sent from Yahoo Mail on Android

From:"Toryu junkmail@... [nihontostudy]" <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Date:Thu, Oct 8, 2015 at 10:48 PM
Subject:Re: [nihontostudy] Bolo - stolen sword

 

So fellas i am not the seller nor the buyer.
Just trying to help a young collector who has been burned. Box was delivered with only the koshirae and papers still inside, the blade in shirasaya is missing. An investigation has been opened, again as i get more details I will post them.

Sent from my iPad

On Oct 8, 2015, at 4:06 AM, Lou La Torre loulatorre@... [nihontostudy] <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

 

Which shipping company did you use?

Sent from Yahoo Mail on Android

From:"Toryu junkmail@... [nihontostudy]" <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Date:Thu, Oct 8, 2015 at 12:07 AM
Subject:Re: [nihontostudy] Bolo - stolen sword

 

Stolen in transit while being shipped out of Toronto, Canada within the last week.

Will post pics once we have them

Sent from my iPad

On Oct 7, 2015, at 4:38 PM, Hizen3@... [nihontostudy] <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

 

A little more info. would be helpful . Such as where ,when, circumstances
surrounding loss .
Also a copy of oshigata and photos would be very helpful .


In a message dated 10/7/2015 7:10:35 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com writes:

Where, when and how might be nice?

Gordon

2015-10-07 22:48 GMT+09:00 Toryu _junkmail@..._
(mailto:junkmail@...) [nihontostudy] <_nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com_
(mailto:nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com) >:

Tokubetsu Hozon Yokoyama Sukehira Custom Order Katana
Title says it all. This is one of the best works ive seen from this smith
if not his best! this is the full package, sword in new shirasaya,sword
bag,koshirae ect.. katana sword has NBTHK tokubetsu Hozon papers dated jan.
2014 also has nthk papers done in april (so blade is double papered),
koshirae was granted papers by nthk in april this sword is in new polish and is
amazing.. it has only been submitted to tb hozon but I feel its def. a shoe
in for Juyo.
Sukehira is considered one of the top smiths in the shinshinto period and
founder of the shinshinto period bizen yokoyama group.
This sword was a custom order by the samurai himself. translation of blue
frost could be the name of the sword or ive also been told quite possible
the samurai whom owned it .
mei reads yokoyama ise-no-kami sukhira d
ated 1806, biyo osafune junin, morisawa yoshizane/ yoshimasa's decendant
nagayasu (seiso ) (blue frost)
pretty darn cool and important if you ask me. blade is as follows
Nasasa 63 cm. Sori 0.9 cm. Kissaki: 7.5 cm.
Moto-haba 3.2 cm. Saki-haba 2.5 cm.
Moto-gasane 0.8 cm. Saki-gasane 0.5 cm.
nakago is ubu and has one mekugi-ana . the o-kissaki is just beautiful
with a ko-maru boshi. hamon is suguha, kitae is itame, as I said this sword is
Juyo quality in my eyes, just simply stunning . koshirae as mentioned got
papers in april at Chicago. very nice tsuba and nice dragon fly them on
fuchi-koshira. a complete papered package.

lets help the owner find his baby...

Sent from my iPad

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Bolo - stolen sword
messages.msgSnippet: Since coming from Toronto:  In the past there has been an issue with swords passing through Chicago post office.If this sword was bound for the US and past
messages.messageBody:
Since coming from Toronto:  In the past there has been an issue with swords passing through Chicago post office.
If this sword was bound for the US and past through there, in the past many items have magically resurfaced with enough inquiry.

Curran

From: "Richard George rkg@... [nihontostudy]" <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com

rkg

lets help the owner find his baby...

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Bolo - stolen sword
messages.msgSnippet: Where, when and how might be nice? Gordon 2015-10-07 22:48 GMT+09:00 Toryu junkmail@toryu-mon.com [nihontostudy]
messages.messageBody:
Where, when and how might be nice?

Gordon

2015-10-07 22:48 GMT+09:00 Toryu junkmail@... [nihontostudy] <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>:
 

Tokubetsu Hozon Yokoyama Sukehira Custom Order Katana
Title says it all. This is one of the best works ive seen from this smith if not his best! this is the full package, sword in new shirasaya,sword bag,koshirae ect.. katana sword has NBTHK tokubetsu Hozon papers dated jan. 2014 also has nthk papers done in april (so blade is double papered), koshirae was granted papers by nthk in april this sword is in new polish and is amazing.. it has only been submitted to tb hozon but I feel its def. a shoe in for Juyo.
Sukehira is considered one of the top smiths in the shinshinto period and founder of the shinshinto period bizen yokoyama group.
This sword was a custom order by the samurai himself. translation of blue frost could be the name of the sword or ive also been told quite possible the samurai whom owned it .
mei reads yokoyama ise-no-kami sukhira d
ated 1806, biyo osafune junin, morisawa yoshizane/ yoshimasa's decendant nagayasu (seiso ) (blue frost)
pretty darn cool and important if you ask me. blade is as follows
Nasasa 63 cm. Sori 0.9 cm. Kissaki: 7.5 cm.
Moto-haba 3.2 cm. Saki-haba 2.5 cm.
Moto-gasane 0.8 cm. Saki-gasane 0.5 cm.
nakago is ubu and has one mekugi-ana . the o-kissaki is just beautiful with a ko-maru boshi. hamon is suguha, kitae is itame, as I said this sword is Juyo quality in my eyes, just simply stunning . koshirae as mentioned got papers in april at Chicago. very nice tsuba and nice dragon fly them on fuchi-koshira. a complete papered package.

lets help the owner find his baby...

Sent from my iPad
